content.detailedDescription:
I live at inntownsuites room 212, back edge of bldg. i always take notice of orion belt,ever since a kid it's always overhead, which is why i saw this light moving in the southwest sky. it was very shinny like a star but moving towards the city of homewood or busy roads ahead. more or less a large dot of brightness slowly crossing the sky overhead & into the neighborhood to the east of me. i was surprised & wished someone was with me. i lost sight it  just disappeared as i watched it in the sky. if it had gone further it would have been over a busy area of town, shopping centers, fast food, and major roadways.
i have lived at this spot for about 4 years. in the last year or so say 2011 till the present i have been amazed at what i have scened. this area is where the hotel is located kinda in a business zone,other than the night-shift workers at pepsi/mt.Dew and barber's diary.
i
could tell of other incidents but don't remember dates and details as well
i listen to coast to coast heard someone say we should report what we are seeing. for some reason i began  seeing more than i bargan for.
content.summary: Looked up thur tree saw light moving. kept following to see if an airplane. continued a slow-moving line overhead. then it disappeared over a distance.

content.detailedDescription: while photographing the eclipse on dec. 10 2011 i unknowingly captured 3 unknown objects in front of the moon.They seem to be reflecting light and do not move much during the 1 hour event.I took several pictures ,aprox. 1every 10 mins. i did not notice the objects until i got the pics. back. they seem to stay in there triangle pattern the whole time.  any help would be appriceated,im hopeing for a simple explination,thank you.
content.summary: While photographing eclipse i also captured 3 unknown objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out the window and then saw bright blinking lights go on and off towards the socorro mountains and when i looked up i saw two or three diamond shaped ojbects blinking amber, blue and red slowly go from above our house to over towards the socorro mtns. where the light would eventually go out.  sometimes they travelled west towards the manzano mtns. and looked like they either descended into the mtns or the light was just turned off.  prior to any movement there is always a bright blinking light from the socorro mtn direction.

i sent the a digital photo to the exec. director of mufon.  i could not get my files to attach to this report.  i also have two additional pictures.  it looks like a stationary star, but when you photograph it...You can see it moves pretty rapidly.
content.summary: For the last sever months we see a bright blinking light towards the socorro mtn.  then we see several diamond shaped objects slowly travel together and hover then descend into the manzano mtns. or by socorro.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out of the school that i'm currently enrolled at and my and my fianc��� were bout to leave when i seen this orange light. my fianc��� started to record it and after we thought it was gone i looked and seen another two so i drove the car across the street and continued to record it after that one i believe we seen another 2 lights. i was trying to figure out what it was but till this day idk what it could have been
content.summary: It was crazy i've never in my whole life seen anything like that

content.detailedDescription:
A group of us were walking across campus heading east when we noticed a bright orange-pink light coming towards us beneath the cloud bank.It was flying above the tree tops&was about the size of a golf ball traveling across the sky heading west.As we observed the starcraft it suddenly changed course&seemed to be descending just north of us.The unidentified craft was moving slow enough that we had a conversation trying to figure out what it could be.When it changed its direction&begin heading n/w.About 30seconds after the object changed course the bright glowing light went out,but we could still see the craft for a few seconds&then it disappeared-this was @8pm-
  about an hour later we found out that across campus at the same time of our sighting a couple, who were also out,observed this glowing salmon object,however their vantage point was better than ours.They saw the craft turn off the bright light after it changed direction to n/w,but they didn't lose sight of it.Apparently the craft began to circle the university&surrounding area with its light off& when it arrived at the location where we first noticed the glowing object it turned on its salmon colored light again- as the light was turned back on it again cruised towards the western sky.After a couple of minutes cruising at a low altitude& speed it began heading n/w& the craft again turned its light off &disappeared for the second time-then there was a third pass following the same pattern & then it vanished-we have no idea what the object was or what the purpose of it's flight pattern-all five witnesses got together to try and figure out what we observed on the evening april 7th 2013,but we are at a loss as to what the identity of the craft was or what its purposed flight was doing above our heads-any information on the mysterious object would be greatly appreciated-
-
content.summary: We were very surprised 2 see a craft.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacations, driving in bonita springs on the road 41 down to naples to visit a friend, around 9pm. a friend of mine was in the car with me. we suddlenty look to the east and saw what looked like ufos. we had seen a big fireball/ball before, in december 31th, hovering in the same neigbourhood and just moved over the private pool we were bathing. it looked the same, but they were 4-5 this time, and farer.
we decide to park and try to take a digital video with my mobile phone. on december 31th, i had no time to get out of the pool, find the mobile phone and tape or take pictures, the orb was already to far and high to tape anythng.
on the end of the video enclosed, you can see that we loose the sight. but before i recorded, i could say we observed the orbs for about 2-3 minutes. maybe there probably here nefore we realize.

i can say it's not the firt time we see ufos, and we were hoping to catch a video someday. that's why we didn't submit any report before, we wanted to have a video evidence. 
we are used to look up in the skies. i don't know why, but we have observed a few times ufos at dusk.
content.summary: Ufos lights and fireballs over naples / bonita springs florida march 30th 2013

content.detailedDescription: My wife returned home from the grocery around 2045pm and i was walking out the front door to smoke. i noticed in the distance above the trees 4 bright, big fiery orange lights that seemed to either be rotating or lighting up in sequence. after all 4 were lit, it disappeared. then it repeated the sequence a second time. i yelled to my wife to come to the door as i grabbed my video camera. by the time she got there (after the 2nd sequence) it was over and from the original position of the object i noticed there were dozens of star-like twinkling lights shooting off in all directions.
content.summary: 4 bright orange lights

content.detailedDescription: One sunny day, as we were travelling with my husband back to kozloduy, i was taking pictures with my camera. suddenly i saw a glowing object on the picture. it was really suprising for me, because the sky was almost clear. there were only little, white, fluffy clouds. but the object doesn't looked like them, as you can see on the picture. i actually didn't saw it really. to make sure that it isn't some defect on my lens, i made some more pictures, but the object didn't showed again. after we saw that picture, we joked "what the aliens would be searching for in a small village like butan??? " :d now seriously, i don't know what to think. i send you this picture, so you can say your opinion.
content.summary: Strange glowing object  shot with my camera

content.detailedDescription: We were 3 person .One of our freind want to send some money to his father .We went together by car to the bank.  he only entered the bank to send money while me and other friend waiting him my friend please take some photos  of houses built on the top of that mountain and i ageed with him tried to have some photos . after we went  from that place latar in afternoon i went to one of  my friends house while we were sitting togather i open photos i have in  the morning surprisingly i saw something like ufo on  my photos  which we could not saw at that time but clearly captured in c360 camera i have in my cell phone.
content.summary: A gaint object never seen before

content.detailedDescription: I saw tranparen entity at a hospital. this being clearly had a cloaking device of some sort as it could not allways hide it's eyes. one it noticed it's eyes could been seen slightly it would quickly hide them . this being was about 3ft tall. it was there to study so a science collector of sorts. i am not the only that saw this.
content.summary: Alien sigting

content.detailedDescription: Multiple lights moving at a fast speed, stopping and immediately change direction.  multiple lights moving together, like chasing each other, covering wide degrees of the sky for the distance.  observed outside and discussed by multiple related and unrelated witnessed (during a party where alcohol was consumed).  no one could support a guess for what it was.  no observable noise (although distance could have been a factor)  lasted about 10 minutes.  seemed to be outside of current human (publicly known) technology.  inertia would break apart the craft and incapacitate the pilot performing these maneuvers in current military aircraft.   this memory has stayed with me as i still have no idea what it could have been.
content.summary: Fast moving, abruptly changing direction

content.detailedDescription:
Hello! i filmed a strange light in itajai, sc, brazil, late on saturday 06/04/2013.Postei the original video, unedited, on youtube. follow the link: 
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: See in vídeo: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

content.detailedDescription: I saw a white ,changed  colors, blue and white/ revolved and moved over my house. was traveling fast.
content.summary: Watched the white pulsing and revolving object go over the area.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a summer night (i am going to say probably 7yrs ago.)

i had just set up my telescope as it was starting to get dark.  as i am setting it up i look up into the sky above the mountain behind my house.  this mountain is an army training center and the only aircraft there are helicopters.

i see this bright red dot appear in the the sky to the se.  it was stationary not moving and was a steady red color with no blinking lights.  as i am staring at this red circle i see another red circle appear  directly above the mountain and slowly move toward the first red circle.

the second red circle eventually gets to the fist red circle.  note that this circle is identical to the other one.  solid red and not blinking.

the two red circles are sitting motionless in the sky next to one another.  pretty soon the second red circle which is to the left of the other red circle from my point of view rotates so that it is now above the other.  it did this smoothly in an arc type movement.  the two circles sit there for another minute then the red circle on top moves back down next to the other red circle just like it was before.

again they sit motionless in the sky (no sound and it was a clear night)  pretty soon they start moving slowly to the se over the hill and out of sight.

i have lived on this property for 32yrs.  i was born and raised here so i am very familiar with the helicopters that fly over head.  99% of them are blackhawks with the occasional huey back in the day and an occasional apache.

with how clear the sky was the night this happened there is absolutely no way i would not be able to hear helicopters at 1000 or so feet in the air.  the sound of the blades echos throughout the area even on cloudy days you can hear them.  also, all the helicopters around here have blinking lights and don't glow a solid red and are silent.

i immediately called air traffic control at the airport in the next town which is 10 miles away and they said the only thing that they show in my area was 1 small light aircraft. a couple minutes after talking with the tower that small aircraft flew over my house going ne.

i am convinced this was not a helicopter.  it sure as hell wasn't a plane because planes don't sit still in the sky making no noise.  when all this started happening i yelled for my dad and he came outside and witnessed everything as well.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red circle moving across sky.  meets up with second red dot and they play in sky.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Very beautiful, and positive frequency from it. seemed as if they were having fun. the flight pattern was straight up to the sky, coming straight towards me at a alarming rate like nothing ive ever seen before, i thought it was a nuclear bomb! then all of a sudden it reduces its speed and slightly turns like a motorcycle wood, then increases speed again and is headed to a whole other direction 90 degrees right of them. then the spacecraft moved as if it wanted to be seen, was like a dish with top as usually interpreted. blue lights circulating the dome and every turn a white light sparks, u can clearly see the shape of the objects because how clear it was! the blue was vibrant and different i liked it, im just a young man from baltimore i have a great video i promise on my life i will drop dead right now if im exaggerating anything, i am happy to experience somthing that the whole world is questionable about. give me a call guys thanks!
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Star-like
content.summary: Very beautiful, and positive frequency from it. seemed as if they were having fun. the flight pattern was straight up to the sky, coming straight towards me at a alarming rate like nothing ive ever seen before, i thought it was a nuclear bomb!

content.detailedDescription: I would like to start by stating for the record that i am prior-service military and am a trained observer. i was sitting in my bedroom at approximately 12:30am with my window open when i heard a jet engine-like sound. i looked out of my window and observed a dark craft of triangular shape flying roughly 100 feet above treetop level, moving steadily along a southwest heading. it had a red signal light at the center of its ventral surface and white running lights on all three points. i thought it was an aircraft in distress because there are no airfields near my house and it displayed what appeared to be landing lights. i assumed it was an aircraft making an emergency landing. i immediately ran outside. i live in a residential lake of respectable size, with houses close together. while looking for the craft, i saw three more craft of the exact same configuration at approximately the same altitude (100 feet above treetop) and all of them were following the same southwest heading. one passed over my house and i clearly saw a dark hull. it was a solid craft. i am a believer in extraterrestrial life but i have never witnessed a ufo before tonight. i am both confused and excited. i lost sight of all four craft as they continued along their heading and out of my line of sight.
content.summary: Multiple triangular craft over residential lake.

content.detailedDescription:
While riding my atc, @ 3:33am i parked aside the road to secure my cooler. i was looking north to east across the valley, i noticed a dim but vived glow appear! as i watched(aprrox 90sec), it brightened lifted off desert floor, paused & hovered(approx 33sec), then suddenly flew in a straight path toward the north-east dissapearing into outer-space! i have observed several similar events and 3 known 3rd kind encounters! all encounters happened in the same area of the desert, not far from my home... 

thanks for reading,    

dusty roads
content.summary: I saw the glow in the valley appear, brighten, lift-off, hover, fly away.

content.detailedDescription: I had just picked up my son from his fathers house at 57th and bennington in kansas city, mo when i noticed red lights in the sky. i stopped in the middle of the road to get a better look at them and. saw that there were three of them right above the treetops about 100 feet north of me. they were all pulsating at the same time kind of like railroad crossing lights and i noticed a black triangle that was attached to them that was right above the clouds. it was hovering but not completely still. a car approached me and honked so i moved further down the road and pulled off to take pictures but as i rolled my window down five cars approached me head on and their headlights blinded me. when my vision came back to me i looked up and the triangle and lights were gone. after i felt sick to my stomach and my head seems to feel an unusual amount of pressure.
content.summary: Triangle observed over 55th and bennington in kcmo

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside star gazing i saw what resembled a star in size and color. the light emanating from the craft did not blink or resemble an airplane or helicopter. it flew at an extremely high altitude and appeared to fly at a high rate of speed. it made no noise at all and disappeared right before my eyes. this is the 4th one i've seen in 3 days.
content.summary: Starlike craft flew over and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog prior to bed as i do every night. i always have been intrigued by ufo's and have seen a couple before so i tend to glance at the sky and just observe in case there is something odd. when i first saw the light i thought it was a plane, it looked like a conventional aircraft at a glance. i don't know why i even kept looking, but i did. i noticed that the light had a flowing pattern to it. it would light and seemed to follow a curved, sphere like or circular pattern. it was a blue halogen light type color, and there were no strobe, or blinker lights, as u would see on a plane or conventional craft, so i kept looking. the craft appeared headed for a cloud bank and looked like it would disappear soon. prior to reaching this bank, when there was still a visible space between the craft and the clouds, it disappeared completely. i continued watching as there was an opening in the path of the craft where it would soon be visible again, but i never did see it again. after seeing it and thinking about it, i realized that a conventional craft would have had some form of red and green blinking light associated with it. i found it exciting, the unknown is always something that has intrigued me.  this may not be the most incredible sighting, but i wanted to report it as i had never completed this after my previous sightings.
content.summary: Blue halogen colored lights, progressive wave-like light, no blinkers such as a plane

content.detailedDescription: Our family was on the way to colter bay rv park. my nephew was taking pictures of the beautiful grand teton mountains. he noticed object on camera screen. he showed me the camera and i instructed him to continue taking pictures. we never heard or saw anything visual in the sky. all we had was the actual photograph of an object. on the way home, we stopeed in roswell. we showed it to the museum. they asked when it was taking and stated they had sightings at that same time. they gave us mufon in san antonio paperwork. time passed and we did not think much of the incident.
content.summary: Picture taken in grand teton mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
My partner and i were sitting on our enclosed balcony watching a thunder/lightning storm. at this point the storm had been dying down, and lightning would strike every 1-3 minutes, with rumbling thunder about 10 seconds after each strike. the rain was steadily coming down, but not a downpour. by this time storm had been going on for about 30 minutes.
suddenly i saw two very large yellow-amber lights and a smaller, pulsing red light between them coming through the dense clouds in the distance. it was coming from the general direction of the airport, so my first thought was that it was an airplane. this is when i pointed the lights out to my partner (he was facing the opposite direction). but then i realized that no commercial plane would take off during this weather. judging from the size of the lights, i thought it could be a cargo plane, as we live about 20 miles from the niagara air force base, but my partner said that cargo planes have 4 yellow lights, and these were distinctly two very large lights. also, the lights were moving much more slowly than a plane would.
as the lights got closer i saw that the red light was in between but slightly behind the two yellow lights. it was a bit more than half the size of the yellow ones, and it was slowly pulsing. i would say that the light was solid red for two seconds before going dim, and it was totally out for about one second. it was not making any noise-- if we had been inside we never would have known it was there. my partner said he saw it teetering slightly but i did not notice this. the lights were in our line of sight for about 1-2 minutes total.
as it got closed we noticed that the lights appeared to be connected, rather than being on wings of an aircraft. they passed directly overhead and we made out what appeared to be a triangle-like object, but the surface was very dull. we do not recall seeing a third yellow light. right before it went over our building and we lost sight of it, each yellow light was approximately the size of the diameter of a aaa battery. when it went overhead it didn't seem too close to the surface, but it was certainly closer to the ground than any airplane i have ever seen (that was not in the process of landing). it still did not make any noise
normally we would have rushed outside to keep observing it but we didn't. i guess it was because of the weather, but we also were in such shock and awe that we couldn't move. both of us had our iphones with us, and during the sighting neither of us even thought to take any video.
just as a side note, we have 4 cats and a dog, and none of them seemed to be acting out of the ordinary. all of our lights were out so we did not see any electrical activity.
content.summary: During thunder/lightning storm 2 large amber lights with pulsing red light in between, moving very slowly. possible triangle shaped craft. made no noise.

content.detailedDescription: I had just picked up dinner, so as im walkimg inside with it and i look towards the south and i see 4 bright lights that i thoght might have just planes getting ready to land or something. i showed someone else and he said it definately looks werd, might be a ufo, but its probably just the landing gear on some planes. nothing too spectular happened but it did sttrike me as unusual. we were on a hill in mahopac looking south, it appeared that the crafts were somewhere above either somers/baldwin place  or jefferson valley/yorktown heights. for a period of about a half hour, 4 ships floated aroumd displaying extremely bright lights on and off and really just floated aroumd during those 30 minutes i saw them. i lost them gurdually through the trees and called it a night but who lnows, maybe there were there longer.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On the hill where i live, i look towards the south and i see 4 bright lights far away.

content.detailedDescription:
For the past 2 years i have watched the stars nightly before heading inside for the evening.  i do so because of previous sightings in crooked river ranch and because of an unexplainable sudden connection with the cosmos.  
tonight i had already done my couple minute gaze, but had an urge to go back out and take another look.  oddly, i adjusted the canopy on my backyard swing so i could gaze at "my star" (the brightest, now in the western sky).  
i say oddly here because it was already chilly outside and i have a broken hand so the extra effort on this night was odd.  
i had almost finished my cigarette when i spotted the orb.  i first noticed the brightness and began looking for flashing lights or other indications of usual aircraft.  i ruled out any flashes and could clearly see multi-directional movement while approaching me.  as it came almost directly overhead i began scrambling for my phone to call my wife outside.  while telling her to come outside the orb paused while overhead then continued course towards the e-ne.  my wife joined me in viewing at this point and confirmed multi-directional movement, increasing brightness, and no flashing lights.  i managed to get a video but it had already moved to our treeline and was too far away to be of any usefulness.  

while it was approaching i had the feeling that i had already expected this spectacle, and when it was overhead my body tingled from head to toe and i was filled with a feeling of happiness and calmness.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brilliant white orb moved above head paused, with directional movement, then continued on slowlya

content.detailedDescription:
On 2013-03-29 me and my family had just moved into our new home we were renting in south-africa roodepoort scrooby street ruimsig. we were 2 adults and 2 children that witnessed the event. we were all sober and were having a barbeque at approximately 20:30 and it was on a friday. the sky was clear with no clouds and only stars.

while we were sitting around the fire facing south my son said he observed a weird light in the sky to his left in the east. at first we thought he was joking but then we all looked up and was amazed to see a strange orange/redish orb with a fire burning inside it moving towards us from east to west in a straight path not going right or left or up or down.

the orb was moving slowly at a constant pace and made no noise whatsoever. while we were all watching it moved over our head at 90 degrees. we could all see the fire burning inside. it was defnitely not a flying disc or normal ufo and not matallic at all. my son tried to take a movie with his phone but it was totally blurry and not worth it wich was weird because we saw it clearly like a dull but burning fire inside the orb.

we all fealt very peacefull and it was almost like an angelic experience.
the orb continued its path right over our heads to the west. we watched it until it finally dissappeared over the horizon.

we were all left dumbfounded but in awe of what just happened.
the whole experience lasted about 5 minutes.

yours sincerely

fred
content.summary: Orange red orb seen by me my wife and our 2 children above our new home just before we moved in on 2013-03-29...South-africa roodepoort

content.detailedDescription:
1. on my back patio looking up smoking a tobacco cigarette. 
2. a reddish, shooting star like streak.
3. a shimmering star or airplane. 
4. a repeated pulsation of dissimilar to other objects (stars, airplanes at varying altitudes) light over about two minutes.
5. i looked around to see if any of my neighbors might be up and noticing something, unsurpisingly no one was there, i considered waking my family up. 
amazement. 
6. it faded/left my sight in an unfamiliar fashion for anything in the sky.
content.summary: Was having a cig, noticed what i 1st thought was a brief reddish shooting star. then a localized light pulse/flash, not similar to other visible airplane. then faded out. not in a directional manner.

content.detailedDescription:
Let me first start by saying that after i saw this creature i forgot it for about 2 months. when i remembered, i couldnt stop talking about it to my mom, husband, friend. i didnt mention it to my granddaughter, son or daughter. the rest of the family werent told either, i was afraid that they would be frightened enough that they wouldnt come over. my house was the house that had all the family gatherings. i guess the other reason i didnt mention it to the rest of the family is my husband teased me and laughed it off saying i had been over medicating. i do take meds but its for diabetes. i didnt like the idea of being laughed at, which leads me to mention now that this occurance was 2 years ago. today i still cant sleep without having a light on in my family room, i do not stay up late by myself, when my husband goes on business trips i have my mom stay with me. 
my husband, mother in law and 2 small dogs were asleep at 2:00am, morning but i was always up late. taking down the decorations since it was now january and the new years celebrating was over. i have a short 2 step ladder im using and reaching up to remove lights attached to living room window when i step down off the ladder and decide to sit down for a break. the lamps are on, tv is playing and i sit on the sofa and i'm doin that when i see something flying by. not in the middle of the room but closer to the wall where my step stool is. this thing flew, not with wings but like supermam would fly right by me. it was going south but actually turned its head around and looked at me. as it was looking at me it continued in the direction it was headed and flew right through my living room wall. as it flew by and out, my step ladder was right under it, it kicked my step stool so that i heard the metal sound like when someone would step on it or lean on it, metal sound. i could see right through it, i could see my wall, my painting on the wall, i could see right through it but it was clear as day. no loose clothing but a bald head, the funny thing is, the bottom half of this thing was in a triangular shape. although it turned and looked at me i was frozen, it was just gone. i dont remember going to sleep after that.I couldnt figure out what had just went by. i am catholic and i spoke with my priest about this. in our bible it says there are 2 creatures, angels and demons. i just didnt get the feeling this was either of those. i dont want to say alien but what else is there? i couldnt understand why it came from my family room into my living room all the while my lights were on. it just didnt seem to care if it was seen, right? or else it could have gone around my house, or even over my house, but it went through a lighted house with me looking right at it. my mom later asked me if i made the sign of the cross to bless myself. i hadnt, i was so surprised that it had just flown by my desk that had all my blest saints, angels, candles and other statues on what i considered my altar area and it flew by with little consideration for any of that. i have since had my house blessed again but i really dont think it was demonic, i think it was alien. i hear noises and i wonder, is it coming back? is this a regular pathway? from north to south? i laugh, me, a little mexican american woman in chula vista being visited. its scary.
content.summary: This thing turned his head and looked at me as it flew by my living room , while i was taking the christmas decorations.

content.detailedDescription: My freind an i observed orbs red orange rising from channel islands toward santa barbara cali stopped formed a triangle after 10 min   then a straight line headed due east over the pier area then just vanished all three lights at once .  this was no know aircraft   but round reddish - orange orbs under intelligent control since have spotted again. something up here  please investigate!!!
content.summary: Orbs coming from chanel islands

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were looking out the second story bedroom window when we noticed slow moving bright light moving from left to right very slowly. when a plane appeared the object would go dark and disappear, then reappear after plane vanished. i grabbed my digital camera and stated taking pictures. when i took some pictures the object was there, but when i looked at the camera it was not there. this happened several times. i called union city police to report it. they gave me the phone number to mufon. i called and made my report. the mufon representative seem to try to debunk what i saw. he said that i was seeing venus or a plane. i told him that i was a former navy veteran aircraft mechanic and i know the difference between a plane and venus. i got furstrated and said ok, without telling him that i had pictures.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashing yellow and blue lights, moved from left to right then stationary, called u.C. police they gave me phone number to mufon, i called and made report to mufon

content.detailedDescription:
09-apr-13. driving south on egypt pike between new holland, ohio and huston road at 20:52.  saw an amber light appear to my front and left at about 15-20 degrees above the horizon. it appeard, seemed to drop and disappeared. saw a second to the left and above the first.  it acted similar to the first.  then saw a third, again left and above the second.  it acted as the other two.  seemed to resemble flares that i saw in the military, but gave off no light nor did i notice any parachutes allowing them to drift.

i immediately looked to see if i could observe an airplane or something that dropped these.  i could not see anything in the vicinity.  there are always plane/choppers in the area.  but, i saw none in the area when i observed the lights.
content.summary: Amber lights, similar to flares.  however no chutes observed.  watch one, then second, then third.
